GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374403,HE8W_STB_sc64,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374404,HE8W_STB_sc65,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374405,HE8W_STB_sc66,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374406,HE8W_STB_sc67,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374407,HE8W_STB_sc68,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1

GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374409,HE8W_STB_sc70,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374410,HE8W_STB_sc71,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1

GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374416,HE8W_STB_sc77,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374417,HE8W_STB_sc78,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374418,HE8W_STB_sc79,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374419,HE8W_STB_sc80,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374420,HE8W_STB_sc81,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Syncytiotrophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Syncytiotrophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1

GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374422,HE8W_EVT2_sc51,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Extravillous trophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Extravillous trophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
GSE89497,Single-cell RNA-seq reveals the diversity of trophoblast subtypes and patterns of differentiation in the human placenta,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-25,,"In this study, we isolated human villous stromal cells (STRs), CTBs, the STB, and EVTs at the first and second trimester of pregnancy and monitored the transcriptome dynamics of 1567 cells at single-cell resolution. We identified 14 subtypes of placental cells and characterized their functions, especially the unexpected secretion of 102 polypeptide hormone using bioinformatics analyses and immnunostaining verifications. Our study builds a strong foundation for understanding how the human placenta develops and functions to maintain a healthy pregnancy.",Expression profiling by high throughput sequencing,"Xiaoying,,Fan;	Yawei Liu;	Rui Wang",single cell transcriptome profiles of stomal cells and trophoblast cells from 8 week and 24 week gestation of placenta were generated by next generation sequencing using Illumina Hiseq4000.,,,,,"Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_Human_Placenta_TMP_V2.txt.gz;	ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/series/GSE89nnn/GSE89497/suppl/GSE89497_RAW.tar,GSM2374423,HE8W_EVT2_sc52,GPL20301,Public on Jul 24 2018,2016-11-03,2018-07-24,SRA,Extravillous trophoblast of Week 8,Homo sapiens,cell type: Extravillous trophoblast;	cell population: HLA-G+;	Stage: Week 8,total RNA,,human placenta tissues were harvested from the hospital put into DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. the tissue was transferred to the lab on ice within 1 h,"Chrion were scraped from human  placenta and the remaining villi were collected and minced into small pieces. The tissue were digested with an enzyme cocktail (0.125% trypsin 0.04% Dnase and 0.05% type Ⅳcollagenase) for 8 min twice at 37 ℃. Cell suspension were collected by filtering the ezyme mixture with 70 μm cell strainer and the enzyme reaction were stopped by addition of 5% DMEM. cells were centrifuged at 1200 g at 4 ℃ on a percoll gradient (7 layers: 10%, 20%, 30%, 40%, 50%, 60% and 70%) and cells from 30% - 50% percoll gradient were collected and washed with DMEM. EVT and CTB were sorted with MACS with PE-conjucted HLA-G and CDH1 antibody combined with anti-PE beads,STB were purified with mouth pipette based on their big size from the cell population and the remaning HLA-G and CDH1 double negative cells were stromal cells. For isolation of EVT from the basal plate of the 24 w placenta, basal plate were scaped from the placenta, minced and  digested with the method as described above,finally 24 w EVT were purified by MACs with HLA-G antibody.;	the single cells were picked into 2ul cell lysis buffer using mouse pipet, then the transcriptome was amplified by modified smart-seq2 protocol which added in barcode for each cell. the amplified cDNAs were sheared into 300bp  fragments, the 3' end of the cDNAs were enriched to build library with KAPA Hyper Prep Kits for Illumina",,,,,,,,,,,mRNA with polyA tail,"For data from Illumina, Illumina CASAVA version 1.8 were used to the basecalling;	Read 2 was used to obtain the cell barcodes to further split the reads according to the cell IDs (barcode) and the same time recorded the UMI sequences;	Read 1 was picked in each cell and these raw reads were trimmed to remove TSO or polyA sequence;	Adaptor contamination and low-quality reads were discarded from the trimmed Read 1 raw data;	TopHat(version 2.0.14) with default settings were used for sequence alignment and uniquely mapped reads were kept.;	Genome_build: Reference sequence and transcript annotation files were from UCSC genome assembly hg19;	Supplementary_files_format_and_content: TPM (transcripts-per-million mapped reads) data was calculated as the total UMIs for a genes to be divided by the sum of UMIs from each cell and then multiply by 1,000,000","Name: Rui WANG;	Email: fish_cat_wr@sina.cn;	Phone: 15801166445;	Laboratory: Fuchou Tang;	Department: Biodynamics Optical Imaging Center (BIOPIC);	Institute: Peking University;	Address: No.5 Yiheyuan Road, Haidian District;	City: Beijing;	Zip/postal_code: 100871;	Country: China",,0,1
